00019 #ifndef YS_TAX_TYPE_H
00020 #define YS_TAX_TYPE_H
00021 
00022 #include "xmlnode.h"
00023 #include "ys_build.h"
00024 #include <vector>
00025 #include <string>
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 class YardDatabase;
00030 class YardTaxType: public XMLNode
00031 {
00032  public:
00033    
00034     friend class YardDatabase;
00035       
00036     YardTaxType() { setName("Tax_Table"); }
00037     YardTaxType(const string& xml):XMLNode(xml, XMLNode::Str) {}
00038         
00039     static const char * GetUnique() { return "TAX_Name"; }
00040     
00041     /* Getters */
00042     string GetIdS() const
00043         { return child("TAX_ID").data(); }
00044     long GetId() const
00045         { return ToLong(GetIdS()); }
00046     string GetName() const
00047         { return child("TAX_Name").data(); }
00048     string GetPercentS() const
00049         { return child("TAX_Percent").data(); }
00050     double GetPercent() const
00051         { return ToDouble(GetPercentS()); }
00052     
00053     /* setters */
00054     void SetId(const int& a_num) 
00055         { child("TAX_ID").setData(ToStr(a_num)); }
00056     void SetName(const string& a_str) 
00057         { child("TAX_Name").setData(a_str); }
00058     void SetPercent(const double a_num) 
00059         { child("TAX_Percent").setData(ToStr(a_num, YS_TAX_PRECISION)); }
00060     
00066     virtual string ToString(const string& delim = ",", bool quote = true) const;
00067         
00068 };
00069 
00070 #endif
